name: MgoR
description:
The latest in RPG technology, using a powerful engine and engaging mechanics, MgoR is the epitome of RPG games. Trust the lack of information and my refusal to actually show you the game, you will be blown away.

I have been using the internet to share my work for 3 years now, and I think this is my best yet - Anonymous Reviewer

Discord Server: discord.gg/PeRahpv
